definitions.definition: A sudden start aside, as by a horse.
In the Eton College wall game, a point scored by lifting the ball against the wall in the calx.
To avoid due to timidness or caution.
definitions.example: I shy away from investment opportunities I don't understand.
The horse shied away from the rider, which startled him so much he shied away from the horse.

definitions.definition: To throw sideways with a jerk; to fling
